title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: Mezzaro with a center design a flowering tree with animals on the ground surrounding the base. Border of flowers with small Chinese figures. Stitched to strips of unbleached muslin and toile.
